scripts.start:init: yarn start:dev && yarn db:migrate && yarn db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env DB_HOST=localhost npx dotenv -e .env.local -- yarn workspace @services/admin-panel-api db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: cross-env DB_HOST=localhost npx dotenv -e .env.local -- yarn workspace @services/admin-panel-api db:seed
scripts.db:studio: cross-env DB_HOST=localhost npx dotenv -e .env.local -- yarn workspace @services/admin-panel-api run db:studio
scripts.db:migrate-prod: npx dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema services/admin-panel-api/prisma/schema.prisma
